plugin-package.name: VideoChat Portlet
plugin-package.short-description: The Video Chat portlets make it easy to add group video chat to your Liferay portal.
plugin-package.long-description: The Video Chat portlets make it easy to add group video chat to your Liferay portal. This tool provides two portlets, one to manage chat rooms and the other to video chat. This portlet uses OpenTok, a flexible cloud-based API for video conferencing.
plugin-package.author: Rotterdam CS
